commentary.revenue_performance: Consolidated revenue grew by 11% in INR terms (13.3% CC growth). India business grew 8%. Rural growth was 8% vs. urban 10%.
commentary.profitability: Gross margin expanded by 75 bps. Operating profit grew 11.2%. 30% increase in A&P investments.
commentary.business_outlook: The outlook for the full year is for a double-digit growth in International Business. Targeted Rs 500 crores run-rate for Foods plus Badshah business.
commentary.key_challenges: Beverage portfolio saw muted growth due to **unseasonal rains** in North and West India. The **Namaste LLC lawsuit** was disclosed, with the portfolio in question being less than 1% of revenue.
commentary.strategic_initiatives: Hair Oil market share reached 17.4% (highest ever). Oral Care market share consolidated with Dabur Red gaining 50 bps. New **Therapeutics division** established to target 70,000 allopathic doctors for advocacy.
commentary.market_conditions: Moderation in inflation led to an uptick in volumes in both urban and rural markets. Rural volume growth became positive after a prolonged negative period.
